name: VMware Policy File
summary: Learn about .VMPL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VMPL files are created with VMware ACE, a product used mostly in enterprise environments. Policy files are useful in this context when employees work from remote locations using VMs.
NOTE: VMware ACE was discontinued at the end of 2011.

description: File used by VMware, an application used for running Windows, Linux, and other operating systems as virtual machines; defines authorizations and restrictions for the virtual machine; specifies access control to resources such as DVD-ROM drives, the company network, and the Internet.
